snippet: Malaysia Airlines has begun giving out $50,000 in advance insurance payments to families of people aboard the missing Flight 370, but many Chinese relatives have indicated that they will reject the money.
abstract: Malaysia Airlines begins giving out $50,000 in advance insurance payments to families of people aboard missing Flight 370; many Chinese relatives have indicated that they will reject the money.
lead_paragraph: Malaysia Airlines has begun giving out $50,000 in advance insurance payments to families of people aboard the missing Flight 370, but many Chinese relatives have indicated that they will reject the money.
